channel.title: React on rebased
channel.description: Recent content in React on rebased

item.title: Preloading data for React components
item.description: For every non-trivial web application there is a need to preload some data before rendering the content. For example, to display a list of users we need to fetch it first from the server. React web applications are no exception, so let’s take a look how we can preload some data in React components. React documentation I always check the documentation first when exploring how to do something with React.
